template<class T>
unsigned Array2D< T >::cols (  )  const [inline, inherited]

Returns the number of array columns.

If the array is 2-dimensional, then the number of columns is returned, otherwise zero is returned.

Returns:
number of columns or zero

unsigned ArrayBase::dim ( unsigned  i  )  const [inline, inherited]

Returns the size of the i-th dimension of the array.

Parameters:
i the dimension of which the size will be returned.
Returns:
the size of dimension i.
Exceptions:
check_exception the type of the exception will be "range check error" and denotes, that the value of i exceeds the number of dimensions of the array.

bool ArrayBase::samedim ( const ArrayBase &  v  )  const [inline, inherited]

Returns true if this array and array "v" have the same dimensions.

Checks whether two arrays have the same dimensions independent from their respective types.

Parameters:
v the second array, which dimensions are compared to the one of the current array
Returns:
"true", if the dimensions of both arrays are the same, "false" otherwise
Author:
